bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Walter Scott Neff was a psychologist and author of several books, including Work and Human Behavior, and was also head of the American Peace Mobilization, a Communist-associated organization, founded in 1940.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains FBI files obtained through a FOIA (Freedom of Information Act) request. The files cover FBI observations of Walter Neff and his activities with Communist-affiliated groups and organizations.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Gift of Benjamin Harris, 1999. The accession number associated with this collection is 1999.025.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Information generated by the Department of Justice is in the public domain. Users need not secure permission from the Tamiment library to publish or reproduce materials in this collection.
